Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Sergius and St. Bacchus:

Text.Language: Marenywou] w~ nilaoc: m~mainou] I/couc Pi,~rictoc: n~tentaio n~naimarturoc: nia~gioc Cergioc nem Ba,oc.
Let us gather O people: lovers of God Jesus Christ: to honor these martyrs: the Saints Sergius and Bacchus.
